defaultTerms.title: Partner Terms and Conditions

section1.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
section1.content: By applying to become a LUDUS partner, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

section2.title: 2. Eligibility
section2.content: You must be a legitimate business entity authorized to provide services in Saudi Arabia.

section3.title: 3. Application Review
section3.content: LUDUS reserves the right to approve or reject any partnership application at our discretion.

section4.title: 4. Service Standards
section4.content: Partners must maintain high service standards and comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

section5.title: 5. Commission Structure
section5.content: Commission rates and payment terms will be discussed and agreed upon during the approval process.

section6.title: 6. Data Protection
section6.content: All customer data must be handled in accordance with Saudi data protection laws and LUDUS privacy policies.

section7.title: 7. Termination
section7.content: Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days written notice.

defaultTerms.contact: For questions about these terms, contact us at partners@letsludus.com
